ygData.subject: Re: Maximal Happanings/Maximal signal
ygData.msgSnippet: Ragnar changes to his fearsome Dire Wolf mech mode. He walks out of the base, sending slight tremors in the ground as he goes. Ragnar: I copy, Rodimus.

Ragnar changes to his fearsome Dire Wolf mech mode. He walks out of 
the base, sending slight tremors in the ground as he goes.

Ragnar: I copy, Rodimus. Although I am well protected, I will use 
caution.

He then checks the data sent by Rodimus.

Ragnar: Can you help me, quiaff? I am not used to your language and 
your readings are not understandable. I assume my speaking sweden 
could help encrypt our communications, but I do not know how far that 
is for now...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Rodimus Prime::
> 
> "Right now, Condor, I'd like to monitor the Predacon's actions. 
Whenever this Pred/Tripred battle breaks out I want to know whats 
happaning."
> 
> Rodimus' computer picks up the signal from Windlord's pod.
> 
> Rodimus opens a comm to Ragnar.
> 
> "Ragnar, it seems that I do have something you could do. It seems we 
are picking up a homing signal from a Maximal pod. Track it down. If 
you find Maximals, bring them back. Be careful though, it could be a 
trick."
> 
> Rodimus send the pod's signal to Ragnar.
